creator: Optimum Technology
descriptionHtml:
Ganesh Ringtones & Wallpapers
A new way to worship Lord Ganpati is here!

2020 Update: AUGMENTED REALITY GANPATI - Scan any rupee note through the app and see Lord Ganesha on the note *** Jai Ganesh!

Ganpati All In One is as the name says an All in One app for Lord Ganpati

Read on for the detailed features.
1. Ganpati Worship Page
2. Ganpati Live Wallpaper
3. Ganpati Photo Frame
4. Ganpati Lock Screen
5. Ringtone & Alarm of Ganesh Aarti, Ganpati Stotra, Ganpati Mantra, Ganesh poojan.
6. Text of all ganpati mantra, aarti, atharvshirsh etc.
7. Two games - Ganapati Modak Much, Ganesh Modak Catcher
8. Ganpati Coloring
9. Ganesh Dress up

We thought that there are lot of Lord Ganesha apps on the store, but most of them provide one single functionality. There is not a single app which is universal in a true sense. So we thought to create one.
This Ganpati App provides such in depth functionalities that it is a must have app for any true devotee of Lord Ganesha.

Detailed Features -
1. Ganpati Worship Page - This is the most important feature of this app.
Here you can see Lord Ganpati set on some set like we see during Ganeshotsav.
We have provided with 6 different Ganpati murti.
You can set different mantra or aarti on repeat mode of say 3/11/21/108

We have provided with neat animation of diya, ghanta, flowers, mushak, incense stick etc.
Just open this screen and set the phone aside, it itself is a form of worship.

2. Ganpati Live Wallpaper - You can avail all the above features on the wallpaper of your phone.
No matter which app is running, you can see Lord Ganesha every time you see the homescreen.

3. Ganapati Photo Frame - Here you can click your photo with Lord Ganapati especially in a pose where he is blessing you. You can add color effects as well.

4. Ganpati Lock Screen - On an average day, we unlock our phone 2000 times. What if you could see Lord Ganpati at least 2000 times in any given day. Now, wouldn't it be a nice way of worshiping and keeping Lord Ganpati in your thoughts?
You can also set the photos that you have created in Ganpati Photo Frame as your lock screen.

5. Ringtone & Alarm - The app provides tens of different aartis, mantras, stotras & atharv shirsh. You can set any of them as ringtone of your phone or as an alarm. It feels so good to get up in the morning with the sound of Ganpati Stotra.

6. Text - Complete text of all the ganpati aartis, mantra, stotras & atharv shirsh. In Hindi Sanskrit & Marathi language.

7. Ganpati Games - You can play as Bal Ganesh or Bal Ganpati and help him collect the modakas in these two funny games.

8. Ganpati Coloring - Color Lord Ganpati in various colors & show your creativity.
Color his dress, peetambar, jewels etc & so on.

9. Ganpati Dress Up - Dress Up Lord Ganesha with your favorite pitambar, jewellery & whatnot.

10. AR Ganpati Note - Scan any Indian rupee note and see Lord Ganesha on the note. We call it Ganpati Note.

If you are reading this much, it is clear that there is no substitute to this app. If you are a true devotee of Lord Ganpati, this is a must have app, period. It combines everything that you might or might not have imagines.

And oh, there is more. There is audio recording of lot of different mantra like Ganesh mantra, Ganpati aarti & so on.

Om Gan Ganapataye Namo Namaha,
Shree Siddhi Vinayak Namo Namaha
Ashta Vinayak Namo Namaha
Ganapati Bappa Moraya

This is a very powerful mantra. Just open the main page of this app, and set this mantra on repeat. The vibration of Ganesh mantra makes all the difference!

This app was originally launched during Ganeshotsav since it is the time of year when for 10 days everyone worships Lord Ganesha.

We are struggling to find the right name for this app, if you have any sound suggestions, do let us know in the comments!

Download this Universal Ganpati Devotional App and worship endlessly!

Ganpati Bappa Morya!
descriptionShort: Ganpati Ganesh - Ringtones & Wallpapers - All In One

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Add latest Ganesh Chalisa, Mantra & Songs.
- New and Cool Ganesh Wallpapers Added.
- Minor Bug Fixed.
